title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Run and Scale Agentic AI Applications in Production (AIM243)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在生产环境中运行和扩展智能体AI应用程序 (AIM243)
abstract: Scalable, reliable agentic AI applications need infrastructure that can build, deploy, and manage through a single, repeatable workflow. This session demonstrates how to use HashiCorp Cloud Platform (HCP) Terraform chain dependent infrastructure stages, keep post-run automations in Terraform, and bring unmanaged AWS resources under control using Stacks, Actions and Search & Import. We’ll also cover how, when Kubernetes is the application platform, HCP Vault fits seamlessly into workflows to strengthen security. Expect practical patterns you can apply to run agentic AI with confidence, safeguard sensitive data, and scale operations on AWS without unnecessary complexity. This presentation is brought to you by HashiCorp, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 可扩展、可靠的智能体 AI 应用程序需要能够通过单一、可重复的工作流程进行构建、部署和管理的基础设施。本次会议演示如何使用 HashiCorp Cloud Platform (HCP) Terraform 链接依赖的基础设施阶段,在 Terraform 中保留运行后自动化,并使用 Stacks、Actions 和 Search & Import 将未托管的 AWS 资源纳入控制。我们还将介绍当 Kubernetes 作为应用程序平台时,HCP Vault 如何无缝集成到工作流程中以增强安全性。期待您可以应用的实用模式,以便自信地运行智能体 AI,保护敏感数据,并在 AWS 上扩展操作而不会增加不必要的复杂性。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 HashiCorp 为您呈现。

presenter.name: Cole Morrison
presenter.title: Head of Brand Story & Principal Evangelist
